escalation_message: Need more help? Contact a human directly:

help_me_choose: I recommend trying our Sourdough Loaf! It's a customer favorite.
If you have a sweet tooth, the Chocolate Croissants are divine today.
Our Bagels are fresh out of the oven and perfect for lunch.
ai_responses.explain_product_default: This is one of our signature items, baked fresh daily using premium organic ingredients.
compare_cart: You have a great mix of savory and sweet items. Perfect for a balanced treat!
Looks like you are planning a party! You might want to add a baguette to complete the table.
